mapper.select: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${sortVariable} ${sortOrder}) AS ROWNUM, ua.id as id, ua.user_data_id as userDataId, ud.user_name as userName, ud.user_code as userCode, ua.action as action, ua.module_name as moduleName, ua.changed_attribute as changedAttribute, ua.updated_on as updatedOn, ua.target_table as targetTable, ua.target_id as targetId from USER_ACTIVITY ua inner join user_data ud on ua.user_data_id=ud.id

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${sortVariable} ${sortOrder}) AS ROWNUM, ua.id as id, ua.user_data_id as userDataId, ud.user_name as userName, ud.user_code as userCode, ua.action as action, ua.module_name as moduleName, ua.changed_attribute as changedAttribute, ua.updated_on as updatedOn, ua.target_table as targetTable, ua.target_id as targetId from USER_ACTIVITY ua inner join user_data ud on ua.user_data_id=ud.id
) AS ROWPAGING WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}
select count(1) from USER_ACTIVITY ua inner join user_data ud on ua.user_data_id=ud.id
select action as [key], action as value from view_activity_action
select module_Name as [key], module_name as value from view_activity_module_name
select target_table as [key], target_table as value from view_activity_target_table
select user_data_id as id, user_code as userCode, user_name as userName from view_activity_user
